cause.description:
If you think everyone knows Koalas don't taste good in between two slice of bread, a nice piece of provolone, some lettuce, a pickle, and juicy tomato; well you're wrong.
We need Koalas to keep our eucalyptus forests in check! Eating them for sandwiches is not the way to do this.
Have a heart, not a sandwich.
1. No more Koala Sandwiches
cause.mission: stop people from eating koala sandwiches!
cause.name: Stop the Koala Sandwich Epidemic
